name: SOCOM 3: U.S. Navy SEALs
synopsis: Reprise the role of elite SEAL forces as you carry out various squad-based missions to protect America. SOCOM 3: U.S. Navy SEALs takes you to three new areas of operation: Morocco, Poland, and South Asia. For the first time in the SOCOM series, land and water vehicles play a central role in the gameplay experience.
